title: Free Upgrade for Grand Theft Auto V on PC
headline: Free Upgrade for Grand Theft Auto V on PC
subtitle: Now Available
content:
The upgrade for Grand Theft Auto V on PC is now available to play. This introduces features previously only available on the latest generation of console, including:

- The Career Progress feature to track your criminal movements
- New vehicles and upgrades at Haoâ€™s Special Works (HSW)
- GTA+ Membership to get special benefits in GTA Online and beyond
- Anti-cheat protections and proactive voice chat moderation
- And more

For more details and information visit the Rockstar Newswire.
